attributes.action: Removing state support for convicted criminals
attributes.additional_details:
Dear All,

I have become increasingly dissapointed in the UK's deluded reasoning behind supporting convicted criminals with financial support and living arangements.

It is my belief that when you are to breach the law of the land other than a minor offence (3 point speeding offences for example), you therefore forfeit your right for the land to support you.

After all shouldn't they have to struggle like the rest of us honest and hard working tax payers who CAN exist without breaking the law?!!

Thanks,
